home_page_subtitle: How are you doing this fine day of #monthNow#?
Are you excited to take this survey?
home_page_intoSentence: [adj1:#adjective#]Have you ever wanted to make your #_hp_relation# take a "#adj1#" survey but struggled to think of "#adj1#" questions?
home_page_2ndSentence: Well want no longer, this is the #_hp_solution#.
Not sure this app will help but it'll do its best.
home_page_3rdSentence: Questions are generated through the use of #_hp_clever# algorithms and some form of #_hp_magic# (maybe it's just more algorithms).
home_page_endSentence: Get started by creating a new survey, checking out the source code or trying out some "#adjective#" questions below!
